tourName: Two-Week Thailand Tour: Island Allure and Romantic Seclusion
placesVisited: Bangkok, Ayutthaya, Chiang Mai, Chiang Rai, Krabi, Phuket, Koh Yao Noi
generalInfo: Thailand’s enthralling beauty is perfectly captured on this handcrafted two-week couples tour of the country’s most beloved destinations. You and your partner will journey to intimate resorts that are situated in enchanting areas across the country. Revel in romantic seclusion as you enjoy private experiences that are tailored to creating magical memories during your stay. You will reconnect with each other and share in moments worth cherishing. From award-winning Thai cuisine to unspoiled wilderness explorations and luxury spa treatments, this charming expedition will leave nothing for you to desire.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Cultural Discoveries worth Cherishing
dayInfo.description: Your intimate getaway will kick off in the stylish capital of Thailand: Bangkok. After you land and check through immigration, you will meet your private transfer and journey to the heart of the city. On your way, you will encounter a few of Bangkok’s captivating sights. Your cultured driver will share valuable information about these significant destinations and landmarks. You and your partner, from the comfort of your luxury transfer, will witness the striking cityscape and bustling streets. Bangkok exudes a vigorous energy that will have you two completely excited for the adventure ahead. Soon, you will arrive at your luxurious hotel, and a concierge will welcome you and direct you to your secluded suite. From your private balcony, you will have undisturbed views of the surrounding area. Take some time to unwind before you set off to one of the city’s most coveted restaurants where you will be served by an award-winning chef and have the opportunity to meet the master behind the gourmet Thai cuisine. Your intimate, candlelit dinner will conclude with a panoramic sunset vista over the sprawling city skyline. The following day, you and your partner will discover the country’s immersive culture. After a sumptuous breakfast spread, you will transfer via luxury coach to the ancient city of Ayutthaya. The relatively short and comfortable drive will highlight a beauty of Thailand that you will be yet to experience. The city will slowly fade behind you as you travel away from Bangkok. In front of you, green fields will stretch into the distance where mountains rise from the earth. The serene setting will sweep you two away as it reveals untamed tranquility. Upon your arrival at Ayutthaya Historical Park, you will meet your knowledgeable guide for the day. Together, you three will trek the momentous park in search of the revered temple ruins. Your guide will highlight intriguing facts about the age-old city and the dramatic destination’s origins. As you make it to each pivotal highlight, your guide will let you explore together, and you will marvel at the magnificent monuments and capture memories of this location as you explore to your heart's’ content. You will return to Bangkok later this afternoon after a charming trip to a local floating market. You will travel with boats that gently glide across the water. Here, you can peruse the vivid stalls of intricate items and freshly harvested produce. The calm atmosphere and mouth-watering aromas will keep you thoroughly enthused, and a luxurious sea cruise dinner, accompanied by remarkable sunset vistas, will round off your romantic expedition. Before you depart for your next destination, you will encounter the beloved Bangkok temples. As you arise bright and early, you will tuck into a delightful breakfast and venture to renowned Wats . With a map to guide you, you and your partner will whisk yourselves away to discover the sheer majesty of the most famous Thai temples. Each one will share picturesque scenes for you to create unforgettable memories. You will bask in the beautiful Buddhist spirituality to conclude your riveting tour of Bangkok.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Mai – Intimate Seclusion below Doi Suthep
dayInfo.description: The next stop on your magical escape will be the endearing city of Chiang Mai, which is also known as the Northern Capital of Thailand. The rugged region boasts opulent resorts that are nestled at the base of Doi Suthep , which is the striking mountain range and focal point of this renowned destination. You will arrive in Chiang Mai and comfortably transfer to your premier resort, which will be a secluded and spacious luxury suite. Complete with first-class amenities, your 5-star stay will satisfy your romantic wanderlust. In the evening, you will enjoy a multiple course, gourmet meal prepared by revered Thai chefs at a highly-esteemed restaurant. Your fine-dining experience will share surreal views of the radiant sunset. Early in the morning, on your first full day in Chiang Mai, you will board a private hot-air balloon and take to the sky. The sun will begin to rise over the horizon and reveal the gorgeous landscape. You and your loved one will revel in sweeping views of the surrounding area on this exclusive flight where you will slowly float across rolling green hills, golden temples, and the calmly flowing Ping River. Once you have landed, you will treat yourselves to a marvelous breakfast. With a glass of distinguished Champagne in hand, you will toast to your remarkable and unforgettable adventure. The splendor will continue as you venture to an ethical elephant sanctuary. Here, you will care for the magnificent creatures and learn about the initiative’s beneficial programs. Amongst the untamed jungle setting, you will capture flawless moments of the impactful day, and the evening, you will climb the Wat Phra That steps. The brisk hike to the incredible temple will culminate with a panoramic view of Northern Thailand. Chiang Rai neighbors Chiang Mai, and it is an essential highlight of your handcrafted tour. The city is more traditional by design and beautifully captures countryside simplicity. You will journey here the following day to explore its tranquil allure. On this expedition, you will transfer with an expert guide to an ethnic hill tribe where you will spend the day with friendly locals and learn more about their traditional way of life. Vibrant Thai performances and an authentic meal will showcase their humble lifestyle. You and your partner will be completely immersed in the culture as you connect with these locals. Later today, you will transfer back to Chiang Mai for one last quality Thai dinner to bring your stay to a satisfying end.

dayInfo.title: Krabi – Journey to the Unspoiled Wild
dayInfo.description: You will transfer directly to Krabi on the seventh day of your trip. Its idyllic coastline and rugged limestone cliffs will bring you and your partner closer to the tropical beauty of Thailand. You will witness these spectacular sights as you approach the destination. Shortly afterward, you will privately transfer to your 5-star resort with its own secluded beach where you will into your stylish suite that overlooks the azure ocean. Further enjoy the extraordinary views from the resort’s lavish infinity pool, and spend the afternoon at your leisure as you delight in the peaceful isolation of this intimate location. Enjoy a classy evening at an exceptional restaurant for candlelit romance under the setting sun. You will be served fresh seafood haute cuisine as you soak in the dreamlike setting. The following morning, you will spoil yourselves with a luxurious spa treatment. Ancient Thai massage practices that are performed by professional masseuses, will reinvigorate your mind and bodies. Aromatic fragrances will enliven your senses and heighten this delightful experience. You will leave relieved of any tension and eager for your day ahead where your romantic adventure will continue with a luxury speed boat tour of the neighboring islands and beaches. You will traverse the crystal-clear waters to hideaway seaside destinations where unbelievable snorkeling awaits. Here, you will swim in the crystal-clear water and witness the exuberant sea life in all its glory. The colorful coral reefs share picture-perfect moments that you will capture with your underwater camera. You will then board your very own private kayak and further explore the surreal settings. You can paddle across the calm water and encounter magnificent limestone caves where you two will relish the concealed majesty of the unspoiled tropical paradises. Later today, you will return to your hotel before setting off for an incredible sunset dinner cruise where you will experience uninterrupted romance as you fine-dine above the Andaman Sea and witness the riveting sunset splendor. You will have the unique opportunity to explore the diverse wilderness near Krabi on your final full day here. You will venture out early in the morning to a wondrous nature park, and together, you will wander the winding jungle paths and encounter beautiful wildlife. The park is home to the famous Emerald Pool, which is a crystal swimming pond that is encompassed by natural rainforest. The location is teeming with tropical birds, and lush foliage is rife. As you uncover the natural beauty, you will feel worlds away from home, and to further enrich your jungle escapades, you will transfer to a distinguished hot spring later today where you will dip your heads into the warmly embracing water and indulge in the secluded moments that you spend together. You will return to your resort later today for a delectable dinner and a peaceful nights rest.

dayInfo.title: Phuket – Tour Hideaway Beaches and Beyond
dayInfo.description: Phuket is a dreamy island paradise that boasts a collection of pristine white sand beaches and opulent resorts. You will arrive in Phuket and be met by friendly locals and picturesque settings. In the comfort of a luxurious vehicle, you will transfer to an immaculate seaside resort on the famous Kata Beach. With sweeping views of the transparent ocean and palm-tree lined shores, you will witness sheer beauty from the seclusion of your private balcony. Your 5-star resort will serve as the perfect home base, and a delightfully romantic sunset dinner at a leading restaurant on Kata’s shoreline will bring your first evening to a captivating close. The following day, you will meet your private tour guide for an insightful trip around the island where you will venture to the beloved Phuket temples, stunning beaches, and striking Big Buddha as you learn more about Thai culture and its diverse environment. To top off the riveting excursion, you will visit an authentic market for traditional delicacies, and as you weave your way through the spirited bazaar, you will catch wafts of delectable dishes being prepared. Spoiled for choice, you two will bask in the tantalizing tastes of Thailand. Later this evening, you will board a long-tailed boat and set out over the Andaman Sea where you will delight in a truly unique dining experience as a revered chef prepares intricate meals for you on board the boat. Your private, ocean-cruise dinner will be complete with sunset vistas that give way to a sky full of stars. You will experience more of Phuket’s charm on the next day of your stay when you will board a luxurious speed boat and venture to the less-traveled hideaway beaches that hug the rugged coastline. Your private guide will transfer you to pristine shorelines that are encompassed and accentuated by illuminated coral reefs. You can jump into the warm water and encounter marvelous creatures as you snorkel these lovely destinations. You will then return to your resort later this afternoon and slip into some comfortable clothing. For dinner, you will transfer to a flamboyant Cabaret Show and witness the beloved colorful performances that are unique to Thailand. Your evening will be complete with a gorgeous gourmet meal and elegant cocktails. The following day, after a fulfilling breakfast spread, you will transfer to the pier and be escorted to your final destination.

dayInfo.title: Koh Yao Noi �– A Little Slice of Paradise
dayInfo.description: Koh Yao Noi, an enchanting island, is the final stop on your romantic escape through Thailand. The immaculate location is home to sprawling beaches and incredible snorkeling sites. Here, you will unwind in complete style as you enjoy the remainder of your intimate trip. Transfer to a premier resort with unrivaled seaside views. The world-class accommodation offers groundbreaking luxury for a truly astounding stay on the island. From the comfort of your secluded suite, you will reconnect and celebrate what matters most in stylistic fashion. Though brief, your stay will be inspiring. You will spend the afternoon learning the art of Thai cuisine at an exceptional culinary establishment. With the help of trained chefs, you will uncover the secrets behind many coveted Thai meals and discover how to prepare them yourselves. You will run through the delicate culinary practices in a serene setting on the island. Each mouth-watering dish will completely compel your taste buds, and by the end of the day, you will master the preparation of these intricate recipes. To conclude your tantalizing day, you will enjoy a gourmet dinner under the stars at a leading restaurant. Paired with sumptuous wines, your evening will leave nothing for you to desire. The following day, you will delight in one final luxury spa treatment at an outstanding wellness center on the island. Let the entire adventure truly soak in as you completely relax during the rejuvenating treatment together. The professional staff will ensure that you leave feeling utterly fulfilled, and this lovely experience will perfectly conclude your romantic stay in Thailand. With magical moments aplenty, you will soon return to Phuket and depart for home as close to each other as ever.
